thread.title: Driver caught flying down TCH at 155 km/h on Monday
thread.title_full: Driver caught flying down TCH at 155 km/h on Monday

author: cbc
title: Driver caught flying down TCH at 155 km/h on Monday
text:
Police ticketed a driver who was busted going 155 km/h on the Trans-Canada highway near the Avondale exit on Monday.
RCMP members were using radar on the highway for four hours Monday â€” two in the morning and two in the afternoon.
When the driver was caught going 55 km/h over the speed limit, weather conditions were foggy with drizzle, police said.
Extreme speeders should lose licence, says driving instructor A total of 17 tickets were issued during the traffic monitoring on Monday.
Police had one member monitoring drivers using the radar, while three members in marked vehicles took care of pulling them over.
